name: Chestnut
summary: Chestnut is a casual upscale restaurant specializing in American cuisine, with a menu that can include Southern items as well as ethnicities depending on what is fresh, local, and seasonal. We serve dinner 7 days a week.

name: Tupelo Honey
summary: Tupelo Honey is a revival of Southern food and traditions rooted in the Carolina Mountains we call home. We craft brunches, lunches and suppers that bring family and friends around the table and allow for conversations and cocktails to linger longer than usual.

name: White Duck Taco Shop
summary: The flagship River Duck has flown a block away and now lives on the East Bank of the French Broad River â€¦ now bigger with more parking, indoor and outdoor seating, and literally waterfront! We are incredibly pet friendly and cool as a cucumber due to our new and fancy central heating and air.

name: The Funkatorium
summary: Wicked Weed sour & funky beers are served in a rustic pub with a barrel room & a dog-friendly patio.

name: Fig
summary: New American cuisine with French touches served in easygoing bistro quarters with patio seating.

name: LUNCH.SUPPER!
summary: Innovative American eats & weekend brunch in a rustic space with quirky & ornate fixtures.

name: The Broken Tulip
summary: Seasonal dishes using area-sourced ingredients served in snug quarters with a supper-club vibe.

name: Stella's
summary: Modern Greek fare, including small plates, in a blond-wood minimalist space with a communal table.

name: Perly's
summary: Creative Jewish deli bites & dinners served in a funky, retro eatery decorated with old photos.

name: Secret Sandwich Society

name: Spork

name: Zydeco Kitchen and Cocktails

name: Chomp Chomp
summary: Chomp Chomp defines a unique Pacific Northwest experience inspired by the Japanese Northwest. Enjoy a comfortable atmosphere and gently expand your culinary horizons while enjoying an excellent selection of local and Japanese craft brews, excellent traditional cocktails as well as mixology inspired by Japanese aromatics and citrus.

name: Wild Child
summary: A vibrant neighborhood Bistro and Cocktail Bar.

name: Bacon Bitch
summary: Since 2017, Bacon Bitch has been serving classic American breakfast and brunch inspired by our love for bacon.

name: The Urban Stillhouse
summary: The food menu is a marriage of new and traditional American cuisine featuring elevated takes on classic staples. Guests can expect weekly bourbon-inspired rotating specials and seasonal menu updates highlighting the wood-fired grill.

name: Sammy and Paco's
summary: Cute breakfast cafe spot, Their menu relies heavily on breakfast foods like avocado toast, bagels plus sandwiches and grab-and-go options.

name: The Press

summary: Social is an American Fusion menu inspired by the Pacific Northwest, youâ€™ll find thoughtfully sourced and local ingredients inspiring daily brunch, social hour, and refined dinner menu.

name: Fork and Plough

name: Social

summary: Located in Chattanoogaâ€™s thriving Southside, The FEED Co. is an artful combination of tavern and family dining with a stunning destination, and an inviting farm fresh menu.

summary: Scottieâ€™s On The River, has fast became Chattanoogaâ€™s favorite spot for great seafood in a casual dining atmosphere.
